block_comment: The provided block is designed to control and stabilize the "control jump direct" register based on the clock's rising edge or the "reset_n" signal's falling edge. At the negedge of "reset_n", the "R_ctrl_jmp_direct" register gets reset. On the posedge of the "clk", if "R_en" is high, the "R_ctrl_jmp_direct" register will be updated with the value of "R_ctrl_jmp_direct_nxt". These actions offer a way to synchronize transitions between multiple states.
